title: My LoL files are corrupt
body: The moment i downloaded the PBE client my normal client has stopped working and when i try to open it, it just tells me that my LoL files are corrupted

replies.body: Oh no!  Are they both being saved to the same Riot Games folder?  You'll want them each as their own separate client.  See if a repair might fix this up, otherwise our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help remove corrupted files as well for a reinstall.
